PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 58-year-old married white woman living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. sarah is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and identifies as a very conservative, born-again or evangelical protestant christian.

sarah was born and raised in the u.s. and has been a citizen her entire life. she is a dedicated member of her local church, attending religious services once a week. her strong religious beliefs and conservative values have shaped her political views, and she is a registered republican voter who aligns herself with the conservative wing of the party.

despite her advanced age, sarah is tech-savvy and uses the internet almost constantly, whether for work, staying connected with family and friends, or keeping up with current events and political news. however, she does not engage in any regular volunteer work.

financially, sarah falls into the middle-income bracket, with an annual family income between $60,000 and $70,000. she values her education and career, which has allowed her to achieve a comfortable standard of living.

overall, sarah is a devout christian with deeply rooted conservative beliefs, who actively participates in the political process and embraces modern technology while maintaining traditional values.
